name: Add new incoming LiveChat chats to Google Sheets
description: Every time a new chat incoming in Livechat, Make will automatically add the user to a speified Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1njKJ-wqRAtOuQkJpxUknw0dz3pKQX7bLWwFRvEdxwC8/edit?usp=sharing).
